TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FontStretches extends System.Object
public ref class FontStretches abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides a set of static predefined values.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font.
The <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches> values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)] specification. The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9. Lower numeric values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths.
|Font stretch|usWidthClass|% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>|1|50%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A>|2|62.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A>|3|75%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A>|4|87.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>|5|100%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>|5|100%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A>|6|112.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A>|7|125%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A>|8|150%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A>|9|200%|
For more information on the OpenType `usWidthClass` value, see the [usWidthClass](https://docs.microsoft.com/typography/opentype/spec/os2#uswidthclass) section of the OpenType specification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Condensed As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch Condensed { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents a condensed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A> represents 75% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Expanded As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch Expanded { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents an expanded .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A> represents 125% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ExtraCondensed As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch ExtraCondensed { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents an extra-condensed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A> represents 62.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ExtraExpanded As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch ExtraExpanded { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents an extra-expanded .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A> represents 150% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Medium As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch Medium { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents a medium .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> represents the normal (100%) aspect ratio of the font form. The value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> is equivalent to the value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Normal As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch Normal { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents a normal .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A> represents the normal (100%) aspect ratio of the font form. The value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A> is equivalent to the value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SemiCondensed As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch SemiCondensed { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents a semi-condensed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A> represents 87.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SemiExpanded As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch SemiExpanded { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents a semi-expanded .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A> represents 112.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UltraCondensed As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch UltraCondensed { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents an ultra-condensed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A> represents 50% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UltraExpanded As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch UltraExpanded { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

Docs.value: A value that represents an ultra-expanded .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A> represents 200% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
